short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension checks popular supermarket's product's ingredients and lets you know if they contain animal products!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(Firefox version - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/help-me-buy-good-extension/)

Green Slate is a tool for people trying to make more ethical shopping choices, indicating on Tesco, Morrisons, Sainsburys, Waitrose, and ASDA the following information at a glance:

- Animal based ingredients
- Presence of palm oil
- Distance the product travelled to be in shops
- Recyclability of packaging
- Whether or not the product was tested on animals

Currently in Beta, to provide feedback please contact help.me.buy.good@gmail.com
